last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Revealing the identity and inspiration behind The Ringing World, Jojo reconciles with the past. Duk-gu keeps his end of the bargain.

name: Love Alarm
overview: Love Alarm is an app that tells you if someone within a 10-meter radius has a crush on you. It quickly becomes a social phenomenon. While everyone talks about it and uses it to test their love and popularity, Jojo is one of the few people who have yet to download the app. However, she soon faces a love triangle situation between Sun-oh whom she starts to have feelings for, and Hye-young, who has had a huge crush on her.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In a world where an app alerts people if someone in the vicinity likes them, Kim Jojo experiences young love while coping with personal adversities.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Longing for resounding proof of her feelings, Jojo sets out to uninstall the shield and make the app ring for her one true love.

tagline: When you turn on the application, your heart will ring

episodes.name: The Flash of Lightning Before It Thunders
episodes.overview: Unlike her friends, Kim Jojo has more pressing things on her mind than dating. Upon returning from abroad, Hwang Sun-oh goes to see Lee Hye-yeong.

episodes.name: There’s Nothing Anyone Can Do When You Like Someone
episodes.overview: Sun-oh wants to know whether Hye-yeong has feelings for Jojo and tells him what he did. Jang Il-sik gets into a fight with Sun-oh and Hye-yeong.

episodes.name: The Miracle of Two People Liking Each Other
episodes.overview: Jojo confronts Sun-oh about the photos. As rumors spread at school, Jang-go gets mad at Jojo for lying. Il-sik confronts Jang-go about what she did.

episodes.name: The Best Feeling in the World Is Knowing There’s Someone on My Side
episodes.overview: Sun-oh asks Jojo about the school trip and realizes there’s not much he can do for her. Il-sik tells Jang-go something she doesn’t want to hear.

episodes.name: The Gravity of Liking Someone
episodes.overview: Jojo tells Sun-oh about her parents and makes a surprising suggestion. She later confronts Jang-go after overhearing something.

episodes.name: Your Heart is Safe Now
episodes.overview: News of the tragedy hits the airwaves. Hye-yeong finds Jojo at the library and informs her that he plans to court her the old-fashioned way.

episodes.name: Something I’ve Been Holding Back and Can Only Say to You
episodes.overview: Jojo tries to put a shield around herself and tells Hye-yeong she doesn’t need his help, but he offers to take her somewhere special.

episodes.name: One Is Bigger Than Any Other Number in the World
episodes.overview: Jojo ponders what it means to like someone and realizes a shield may not be necessary. Sun-oh wants to know whether she still has feelings for him.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In a world where an app alerts people if someone in the vicinity likes them, Kim Jojo experiences young love while coping with personal adversities.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Curious about her true feelings for Hye-yeong, Jojo returns to her alma mater in search of information on Chon Duk-gu — and runs into her past.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jojo asks Brian Chon about the shield at an event attended by the Badge Club members, including Sun-oh. Hye-yeong comes face-to-face with his father.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jojo offers Hye-yeong a shoulder to cry on after a punishing day. Unable to cope with knowledge of the shield, Sun-oh turns to Jojo for the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: With video of his lecture hall visit gone viral, Sun-oh comes to blows with Hye-yeong. Jojo receives a special gift from an unknown sender.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Park Gul-mi reaches a digital milestone. Brian grills Jojo about the shield, spear and Duk-gu — and shatters reality for a bystanding listener.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Revealing the identity and inspiration behind The Ringing World, Jojo reconciles with the past. Duk-gu keeps his end of the bargain.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Longing for resounding proof of her feelings, Jojo sets out to uninstall the shield and make the app ring for her one true love.
